articles.content: Giant viruses play a role in the survival of single-celled marine organisms called protists. These include algae, amoeba, and flagellates, that form the base of ocean food webs. And since these protists form an important part of the food chain, these... [4080 chars]

articles.title: LPA may become tropical cyclone in next few days - Pagasa
articles.description: The monitored LPA may develop into a tropical cyclone in the next few days, according to the Pagasa on Saturday.
articles.content:
MANILA, Philippines — The low pressure area (LPA) being monitored may develop into a tropical cyclone in the next few days, according to the Philippine Atmospheric, Geophysical, and Astronomical Services Administration (Pagasa) on Saturday.
